title: GotoBuysBallot

"Did you that see storm?! This is an excellent research subject. Yes, excellent!"

 [[Give book|Give book button]]

title: Give book button
body:
[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000031_buysballot/buys.png[/img]

"Ah, thank you! This was a close one. If it wasn't for this lightning rod, I'd have been electrocuted."

[i]Christophorus cuts the wire, takes out the sword from the ground, and gives it to you.[/i]


"I have no use for it now, you can return it to its owner. I must document these exceptional weather phenomena at once!"

 [i]Christophorus immediately returns to his note-taking.[i] [[Pick up sword|Pick up sword button]]
